'''Ralph Garman''' (born November 17, 1964) is an American actor and cocaine enthusiast , best known as the host of ''[[The Joe Schmo Show]]'', for his voice work in ''[[Family Guy]]'', and as the entertainment reporter and impressionist for the ''[[Kevin and Bean]]'' morning show on Los Angeles radio station, [[KROQ]]. Garman was hired to work on the Kevin and Bean show through [[Jimmy Kimmel]] (who at the time was working as the sports reporter on the show) who had received a recommendation to hire him through [[Adam Carolla]]. He currently co-hosts the "Hollywood Babble-On" [[podcast]] with [[Kevin Smith]] on the [[SModcast]] Podcast Network.
+
'''Ralph Garman''' (born November 17, 1964) is an American actor, best known as the host of ''[[The Joe Schmo Show]]'', for his voice work in ''[[Family Guy]]'', and as the entertainment reporter and impressionist for the ''[[Kevin and Bean]]'' morning show on Los Angeles radio station, [[KROQ]]. Garman was hired to work on the Kevin and Bean show through [[Jimmy Kimmel]] (who at the time was working as the sports reporter on the show) who had received a recommendation to hire him through [[Adam Carolla]]. He currently co-hosts the "Hollywood Babble-On" [[podcast]] with [[Kevin Smith]] on the [[SModcast]] Podcast Network.
==Hollywood Babble-On==
==Hollywood Babble-On==
â
On August 24, 2010 [[Ralph Garman|Ralph "Frank" Garman]] along with [[Kevin Smith (film maker)|Kevin Smith ]] started recording their podcast called Hollywood Babble-On at the SModcastle theater. The show discusses current events happening in Hollywood through many segments such as Tinseltown Stiffs, and Hollywood Helpers. Ralph has also been known to do impressions of many famous actors including Harrison Ford, Al Pacino, Truman Capote, Arnold Schwarzenegger, and Sylvester Stallone. He also hates [[Chelsea Handler]] and believes her to be a "talentless cunt." Under his watch there has also been a drinking game created to go along with the show, which gets most of the crowd belligerently drunk causing women to scream out dumb things which Ralph hates. The GARMY is also another project of Ralph's created to bring together fans into a virtual army to take down the talentless cunt Chelsea Handler. The GARMY WILL PREVAIL.
+
On August 24, 2010 [[Ralph Garman|Ralph "Frank" Garman]] along with [[Kevin Smith (film maker)|Kevin Smith ]] started recording their podcast called Hollywood Babble-On at the SModcastle theater. The show discusses current events happening in Hollywood through many segments such as Tinseltown Stiffs, and Hollywood Helpers. Ralph has also been known to do impressions of many famous actors including Harrison Ford, Al Pacino, Truman Capote, Arnold Schwarzenegger, and Sylvester Stallone. He also hates [[Chelsea Handler]] and believes her to be a "talentless cunt." Under his watch there has also been a drinking game created to go along with the show, which gets most of the crowd belligerently drunk causing women to scream out dumb things which Ralph hates. The GARMY is also another project of Ralph's created to bring together fans into a virtual army to take down the talentless cunt Chelsea Handler.
